Hi Trish, 

Hope you had a lovely weekend. Confirming that I've added the Whistleblower Policy page on both MS Brainbank and MS Trials.

Here are the links:
https://msbrainbank.org.au/whistleblower-policy/
https://mstrials.org.au/whistleblower-policy/

Let me know if you would like further changes.

Hi Rica

Thank you for uploading the page and adding it to the footer.

Please can you also do the same for our other websites.

Thank you and kind regards
Trish

Petricia Augustus​

Confirming that we have added the Whistleblower Policy page and ready for you to review.

Dear WP Perk

Please can you add the attached as a new page on all of our websites with a link in the footer like we have for the Privacy Policy.

Please let me know if you have any questions.

If you could advise when this has been completed.

Thank you and kindest regards
Trish
